                       THE GODFATHER THE GAME PLUS 8 TRAINER
                                 
                  RELEASE.DaTE: 03/21/2006   TRAiNED.BY: micral
                          SiZE: 1xSmall            TYPE: Trainer


                            ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ“ ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ“ Ãƒâ€ºÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“  ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸  ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸
  ÃƒÅ“   ÃƒÅ“ ÃƒÅ“ ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“  Ãƒâ€º  Ãƒâ€º Ãƒâ€º  Ãƒâ€º Ãƒâ€º  ÃƒÅ“ Ãƒâ€ºÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ“ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸Ãƒâ€º  ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ ÃƒÅ“ÃƒÅ“ ÃƒÅ“ ÃƒÅ“   ÃƒÅ“
                            ÃƒÅ¸  ÃƒÅ¸  ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸   ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸  ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸   ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸

      In-game Hotkeys:

         NUMPAD 1: Infinite Health
         NUMPAD 2: Infinite Ammo
         NUMPAD 3: Get lots of money             (see notes)
         NUMPAD 4: Max Respect + Skill points    (see notes)   
         NUMPAD 5: Bribe meter always full 
         NUMPAD 6: No Heat                       (see notes)
         NUMPAD 7: Stop Mob War Timer
         NUMPAD 8: One Hit Kill
         NUMPAD 0: Toggle In-game Menu           (see notes)

      IMPORTANT NOTES:

      - For the INGAME MENU to work, you have to run the trainer BEFORE the 
      game and KEEP IT RUNNING WHILE THE GAME IS STILL RUNNING.

      - Most of the options can be toggled ON and OFF by pushing the hot key       
      again, you will hear a confirmation beep sound.
      
      - Get lots of money: after enabling the option you&#039;ll need to pick up some 
      money to see the changes.
      
      - Max Respect + Skill points: same as money you&#039;ll need to gain some 
      respect (e.g. extort a business, kill an enemy, etc.) to activate the 
      changes.
      
      - No Heat: the game will still say the heat level is increasing but cops 
      won&#039;t be chasing you.
      
      *TESTED ON RELOADED CRACK / CLONEDVD VERSIONS.
      
      
      /micral
